name: Breakfast Server
description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 strudel

name: Waitress
description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 cake

name: Barkeeper
description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 wine

name: Sous-Chef
description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 coffee

name: Groom
description: Each time you remove a red guest whose order you completed from your café, you get 2 krones.

name: Stableman
description: Each time you remove a blue guest whose order you completed from your café, you can advance 1 space on the Emperor track.

name: Masseuse
description: Each time you remove a yellow guest whose order you completed from your café, you get 1 krone.

name: Tour Guide
description: Each time you remove a green guest whose order you completed from your café, score 2 VP.

name: Butler
description: From now on, whenever you prepare a blue room (from any action or effect), it is free to do so (pay 0 krones).
notes: This does not grant a free action; it merely removes the cost.

name: Chauffeur
description: From now on, whenever you prepare a red room (from any action or effect), it is free to do so (pay 0 krones).
notes: This does not grant a free action; it merely removes the cost.

name: Florist
description: From now on, whenever you prepare a yellow room (from any action or effect), it is free to do so (pay 0 krones).
notes: This does not grant a free action; it merely removes the cost.

name: Executive Housekeeper
description: Each time you take a die showing 3 or 4, immediately score 2 VP.

name: Restaurant Manager
description: Each time you take a die showing 1 or 2, you can add 1 to the strength of that action.
notes: As always, you can boost this further by paying 1 krone.

name: Decorator
description: Each time you take a die showing 1 or 2, before or after taking the main action, you can also prepare one room (of any color) by paying the normal cost.
notes: You may not take any additional actions between the main action and preparing that room.

name: Bootblack
description: You no longer have to choose when taking a die showing 4: For each die on the action space, you get 1 krone and you can advance 1 space on the Emperor track.
notes: As always, you can boost this by paying 1 krone, for which you will also get 1 krone (back) and advance 1 space on the Emperor track, effectively gaining one space for free.

name: Laundress
description: Each time you take a die showing 4, immediately score 4 VP.

name: Kitchen Hand
description: You no longer have to pay 1 krone when taking a die showing 6; additionally, you can add 1 to the strength of this action.
notes: As always, you can boost this further by paying 1 krone. For your information: We increased the cost of this card from 3 krones (in previous editions) to 5 krones.

name: Checker
description: Each time you take a die showing 5, you can add 2 to the strength of this action.
notes: In other words, you are getting an additional discount of 2 krones.

name: Interior Architect
description: Each time you take a die showing 3, immediately score 5 VP.

name: Detective
description: Each time you take a die showing 5, before or after taking the main action, you can also advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track.
notes: You may not take any additional actions between the main action and advancing on the Emperor track.

name: Chef
description: Immediately (and only once) gain 1 strudel, 1 cake, 1 wine, and 1 coffee.

name: Staff Manager
description: Each time you take a die showing 3, before or after taking the main action, you can also play a staff card from hand by paying its cost.
notes: You may not take any additional actions between the main action and playing the staff card.

name: Custodian
description: Each time you occupy a room (by whichever means), you also get 1 krone.

name: Chief Waiter
description: From now on, moving items from your kitchen onto your guests costs you nothing.

name: Delivery Boy
description: From now on, taking guests from the queue costs you nothing
notes: This does not provide a guest; it merely removes the cost.

name: Conference Manager
description: From now on, you can pay 1 krone to ignore the penalty during an Emperor scoring.

name: Booking Manager
description: During final scoring, score an additional 3 VP for each occupied red room in your hotel.

name: Concierge
description: During final scoring, score an additional 3 VP for each occupied blue room in your hotel.

name: Secretary
description: During final scoring, select an opponent’s staff card in play with the ⇥ symbol and apply its effect to your hotel.
notes: You may not use this to copy one of your staff. If none of your opponents have staff with the ⇥ symbol in play, the Secretary scores nothing

name: Reception Clerk
description: During final scoring, score an additional 3 VP for each occupied yellow room in your hotel.

name: Chambermaid
description: During final scoring, score an additional 1 VP for each occupied room in your hotel, regardless of color.

name: Assistant Manager
description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each staff card you played (regardless of type), including this.

name: Male Floor Housekeeper
description: Each time you get the rewards for completing a guest’s order that required 4 (or more) items to complete it, in addition, score 4 VP.

name: Receptionist
description: During final scoring, score (an additional) 1 VP for each room tile in your hotel, regardless of color and which side is facing up.

name: Page Boy
description: Immediately (and only once) occupy up to 2 rooms (of any color) in your hotel by turning them to the occupied side.

name: Sommelier
description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 wine.

name: Room Service
description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each fully occupied group of rooms (of any color) in your hotel.

name: Porter
description: Immediately (and only once) fill a guest’s order by taking the required items from the supply.

name: Confectioner
description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 cake.

name: Marketing Director
description: During final scoring, score 5 VP for each objective card that has your marker on it.

name: Operator
description: During final scoring, score a number of VP equal to double your position on the Emperor track.
notes: Remember, you lose 7 spaces after the final Emperor scoring; as such, you will usually score at most 12 VP from the Operator. Under the right conditions, though, you can get more than 12 VP from this. This wasn’t allowed in earlier prints, but it is now.

name: Gardener
description: Each time you get the reward during an Emperor scoring, in addition, score 5 VP

name: Barista
description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 coffee

name: Larder Cook
description: Immediately (and only once) gain 4 strudel.

name: Pool Attendant
description: Immediately (and only once) advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track.

name: Female Floor Housekeeper
description: During final scoring, score 5 VP for each floor in your hotel that has all of its rooms occupied.

name: Liftboy
description: During final scoring, score 5 VP for each column in your hotel that has all of its rooms occupied.

name: Hotel Manager
description: During final scoring, score 4 VP for each set of occupied red, blue, and yellow rooms that you have in your hotel.
notes: In other words, you get 4 VP for each occupied room of the color that you have the least of.

name: Dancing Master
description: Each time you take a die showing 3, before or after taking the main action, you can also send a dancer to a ballroom by paying the normal cost. Additionally, you get 1 krone.
notes: You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer.

name: Violinist
description: Immediately (and only once), you get 3 champagne.

name: Concertmaster
description: Each time you take a die showing 1, after performing the action as normal, you get 1 champagne and score 1 VP.
notes: The additional champagne has no impact on the minimum quantities of strudel and cake.

name: Symphonist
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 champagne from your kitchen to score 5 VP

name: Usherette
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 krones to get 1 champagne and score 3 VP.

name: Conductor
description: Each time you take a die showing 4, you also get 1 champagne and 1 krone.

name: Choirmaster
description: Each time you take a die showing 5, before or after taking the main action, you can also send a dancer to a ballroom, paying 1 champagne less.
notes: You may not take any additional actions between the main action and sending the dancer.

name: Leading Dancer
description: During final scoring, score 2 VP for each dancer you have in all 1 (including the balcony).

name: Harpist
description: Immediately (and only once) send up to 2 dancers to the same or different 1, paying up to 2 champagne less for the first and 1 champagne less for the second.
notes: You may not take any additional actions in-between.

name: Cellist
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 dish or drink from your kitchen to send a dancer to a ballroom for 1 champagne less.

name: Pianist
description: Once per round, you can use this card to get 1 champagne.

name: Ballet Master
description: Each time you send a dancer to a ballroom, you also get 1 krone and you can draw 1 staff card from the deck.

name: Trumpeter
description: Each time you take a die showing 2, after performing the action as normal, you get 1 champagne and you can draw 1 staff card from the deck.
notes: The additional champagne has no impact on the minimum quantities of strudel and cake.

name: Arranger
description: Each time you place a marker on an objective card, you also get 2 champagne.

name: Danube Steamship Captain
description: Once per round, after you play a staff card (except this one), you can send a dancer to a ballroom, paying 1 champagne less.

name: Handmaid
description: After you advance 3 or more spaces on the Emperor track during an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) prepare up to 2 rooms (of any color) at no cost and immediately occupy them by turning them to the occupied side.

name: Apprentice
description: After you complete a blue guest’s order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 3 strudel and 3 cake.

name: Dishwasher
description: After you complete a red guest’s order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 3 wine and 3 coffee.

name: Tapster
description: After you complete a yellow guest’s order that required at least 3 items, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) gain 6 krones.

name: Coachwoman
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 coffee from your kitchen. If you do, score 3 VP and you can take a guest from the queue at no cost.

name: Bookkeeper
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 1 cake from your kitchen. If you do, you can prepare one room (of any color), paying up to 2 krones less.

name: Chef de Rang
description: After you get 3 or more drinks (wine and/or coffee) from an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, immediately (and only once) advance 5 spaces on the Emperor track.

name: Interpreter
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 strudel from your kitchen to get 2 krones and score 2 VP.

name: Bartender
description: After you get 3 or more dishes (strudel and/or cake) during an action, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) take a guest from the queue at no cost and immediately fill their order by taking all of their required items from the supply.

name: Wagon Master
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 dishes and/or drinks (no champagne) from your kitchen to get 2 other dishes and/or drinks (different from those spent; no champagne) and score 2 VP.

name: Dog Walker
description: Once per round, you can spend exactly 2 wine from your kitchen to score 2 VP and advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track.

name: Hairdresser
description: Once per round, you can retreat exactly 2 spaces on the Emperor track to play a staff card from hand for up to 3 krones less.

name: Janitor
description: After you fully occupy a group (of any color) comprising at least 3 rooms, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) play up to 2 staff cards from hand at no cost.

name: Entertainer
description: After you place a marker on an objective card, you can turn this card face down. If you do, you can immediately (and only once) fill up to two guests’ orders by taking the required items from the supply.

name: Manager's Son
description: Each time you spend at least 1 champagne during an action, you get 1 krone.
